Spiral Gust.name: Spiral Gust
Spiral Gust.flavor: Your wind blasts in crisscrossing funnels, whipping into your enemies and granting your allies renewed breath.
Spiral Gust.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to the target regains hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Three Shifting Winds.name: Three Shifting Winds
Three Shifting Winds.flavor: The Spiral Wind calls on its cold or thunderous cousins to help you or takes its spiral path one twist further and explodes into radiance.
Three Shifting Winds.special: Choose cold, radiant, or thunder whenever you use this power. Your choice determines both the powerâ€™s damage type and an effect.
Three Shifting Winds.onHit: 4d10 + Wisdom modifier damage of the type you chose.
Three Shifting Winds.effect(Radiant): Each ally in the blast regains hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier + one-half your level.
Three Shifting Winds.effect(Thunder): One target of your choice is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Releasing Breath.name: Releasing Breath
Releasing Breath.flavor: As your friend catches his or her breath, wind gusts past, making you and your allies harder to see.
Releasing Breath.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you uses his or her second wind
Releasing Breath.effect: The target and each ally within 5 squares of him or her gain concealment until the end of your next turn.
